title: We gut entire champions kits, but for Yasuo..
body:
We are giving a partial revert to the 8.11 hotfix.

We are not going to bother with his shield that gives him so much safety for free.

We are not going to address his Q spam in lane which causes the enemy laner to play the minigame of dodge the tornado every 3 seconds.

We are not going to address his Wind Wall. We are not going to fix that he can stand inside the Wind Wall and get 360 degree protection. We are not going to fix that he can block projectiles in the opposite direction.

We are not going to address his infinite mobility spam with no resource cost.

We are not going to address his ultimate placing him deliberately outside turret range and his ultimate giving Yasuo bonus armor penetration for 15 SECONDS. We are not going to address his rank 3 CD of 30 seconds with no CDR.

This champion has caused nothing but unfun gameplay since 2013.

Take {{champion:134}} for example.  The 5.9 update made her S tier and completely overpowered.
